content:
the Illinois volleyball team finally resembled the unit that was expected following last seasons deep run in the NCAA tournament in its performance last weekend at the Texas Invitationalhttpswww.dailyillini.comarticle201209patienceconfidencepayoffforvolleyballattexasinvitational PERIOD

With outside hitter Ali Stark hitting at the net for the first time since suffering a sprained ankle in the Illinis seasonopener three weeks ago head coach Kevin Hambly was able to employ a more natural rotation PERIOD Hambly used both Stark and fellow outside hitter Jocelynn Birks in all six spots  something he had experimented with only sporadically since Starks injury PERIOD

Hambly said Birks play gave the Illini continuity in passing and an attacking threat out of the backcourt PERIOD The redshirt freshman posted  killshttpswww.dailyillini.comarticle201209patienceconfidencepayoffforvolleyballattexasinvitational to lead Illinois to three wins while also tallying doubledigit digs in each game PERIOD

Stark posted her first career doubledouble in the Illinis fourset victory over Cincinnati in the final game of the weekend PERIOD

More court time for Birks and Stark resulted in sophomore Morganne Criswell playing a reduced role off the bench PERIOD The outside hitter played in only one set over the weekend the first set against Cincinnati PERIOD



Hambly expects to utilize a similar lineup entering Big Ten play but said nothing is set in stone and there is always a chance for bench players to make their way into the starting lineup PERIOD

Bomb threat at Texas

A bomb threat on the University of Texas Austin campus Friday morning put a scare into Texas students and faculty and briefly put the status of the Texas Invitational in doubt PERIOD

The threat was received at  a.m. and the university instructed students and faculty to evacuate via text messages at  a.m PERIOD

Illinois was in staying in an offcampus hotel and was relatively unaffected by the scare PERIOD

We were pretty isolated from everything Hambly said PERIOD Were at our hotel just hanging out PERIOD I think the girls were completely oblivious PERIOD If I hadnt announced it on the phone call when I talked to their coach the Illini probably wouldnt have even known what was going on. the threat was deemed harmless by early afternoon and the tournament was held as scheduled PERIOD

Illinois moves up in latest poll

Illinois three victories in Austin put the brakes on a seasonlong slide in the AVCA coaches poll PERIOD

The Illini moved up three spots to No PERIOD  while one of their victims from the weekend Texas fell three spots to No PERIOD  PERIOD

The Big Ten maintained a strong presence in the top  despite Nebraska losing its grasp on the No PERIOD  ranking after suffering its first loss of the season to No PERIOD  Iowa State PERIOD Two weekends ago the Cyclones split two games with Illinois PERIOD The Cornhuskers slipped to No PERIOD  still one spot ahead of Penn State even though the Nittany Lions went  last weekend PERIOD

Minnesota which is Illinois opponent next Friday fell to No PERIOD  after dropping a fiveset match to No PERIOD  Kansas State.Purdue came in at No PERIOD  Ohio State at No PERIOD  and Michigan State moved into the rankings at No PERIOD  to give the Big Ten seven teams in the top   the most of any conference PERIOD

Daniel can be reached at emailprotected and danielmillermc PERIOD
title: Illinois finds right mix during 3-0 sweep of Texas Invitational - The Daily Illini
name: University of Illinois Urbana Champaign
